summary: An ordinance relating to and regulating design, construction, maintenance, use and occupancy of buildings, and amending Sectios 302, 403, 421, 424, 1101, 1110, 1704, 1709, 1807, 1907, 2003, 2004, 2007, 2107, 2201, 2203, 2205, 2304, 2417, 2418, 2420, 2606, 2620, 2628, 2702, 2807, 3301, 3305, 3308, 3312, 3313, 3316, 3702, 3713, 4303, 4602, 5102, 5201, 5401, 5402, 5403, 5404, 5601, 5602, 5603 and 5606 of the Building Code (Ordinance 85500) and repealing Section 3404 thereof.
